# Classroom and facilities

All facilities are located in the *Durfort Building*.

- *Lectures*: Classroom A14.

- *Washrooms*: Basefloor.

- *Cafeteria*: Underground floor.



![Classroom **A14** is located at the 1st floor of the  *Durfort Building*, at the Faculty of Biology of the University of Barcelona](venue_insertimage_1.png)
